response.job_title: Software engineer |  Cybersecurity | IA | Software teacher
response.summary:
Software engineer and teacher, passionate for technology, enjoying building software solutions from management systems, cybersecurity research to accountancy and industrial automation.

Believer in building teams between academy and industry, through development and teaching. Having strong technical skills, focused on backend development, eager to learn, interested on specialize in data, IA and cybersecurity , to bring top performance, well made, cutting edge software solutions.


About my Github repository and projects:
** https://github.com/nicolasenciso

About my CvLAC research CV, papers and academy:
** https://scienti.minciencias.gov.co/cvlac/visualizador/generarCurriculoCv.do?cod_rh=0001680431

profile_positions.description: Software developer for Americas travel industry.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Creating the best software based accountable tool to improve life for PYMES and accountants !

* Software development under agile methodology (SCRUM).
* Microservices architecture, scalable and high performance development.
* Ruby on rails, Python Django REST framework, Java WebFlux.
* Docker deployments on Linux AWS server, bucket using S3, Firebase mobile notifications.
* External API Consuming, dynamic web scrapping, CRON operations.
* IA/Machine learning prototype for image based data gathering/analysis.
profile_positions.title: Backend Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Government program to teach software skills from 0 for 4500+ nation wide students, in which I had the opportunity to introduce teenagers, adults and old fellows to this exciting world, and consolidate my knowledge through teaching ! .

- Chapter 1: Basic programming on Python and how computers work.

- Chapter 2: OOP on Java and Python, intro to GUIs and design patterns.

- Chapter 3: Web MVC with Python Django REST framework, intro to relational DB (MySQL), frontend with AngularJS basic, how to use GIT, Postman and testing endpoints, cybersecurity on microservices and overall web.

-Chapter 4: Microservices, intro to orchestration, Python DRF based API gateway, Java Spring Boot with NoSQL (MongoDB), AngularJS, intro to production deployment on cloud (Heroku).
profile_positions.title: Misión TIC 2022 - Season 2: Teacher / Teacher Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Government program to teach software skills from 0 for 4000+ nation wide students, in which I had the opportunity to introduce teenagers, adults and old fellows to this exciting world, and consolidate my knowledge through teaching ! .

- Chapter 3: Web MVC with Python Django REST framework, intro to relational DB (MySQL), frontend with VueJS basic, how to use GIT, Postman and testing endpoints.

-Chapter 4: Microservices, intro to orchestration, NodeJS GraphQL based API gateway, intro to NoSQL (MongoDB), Java Spring Boot, VueJS, intro to Docker and how to deploy on local and cloud.

profile_positions.title: Backend Web Developer/ DB/ Cybersecurity support

profile_positions.description:
Smart SCADA: EMPRESA DE ACUEDUCTO DE BOGOTÁ
Austrians, germans, spaniards and colombians working together on a massive, metropolis-wide solution to reduce energy and water consumption, to monitoring all valves and related equipment to bring water to Bogotá citizens, improving performance, updating and applying the best security and software solution.

* WinCC OA SCADA control, based on C++ for high performace computing on live streaming data flows.

* Smart SCADA: IA data analytics, SAP sync, ESRI maps, HMI panels, machine learning prediction.
profile_positions.title: Automation/Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
FULL STACK WEB DEVELOPER
Creating a software tool to help PMs, technicians and engineers to track operations, GPS positioning on remote rural areas, and calculating travel and related expenses.

* Frontend AngularJS, using ESRI map, corporative UI/UX design, HTML5, CS3, for desktop and mobile.

* Backend development NodeJS/ExpressJS, JavaScript ECS6. MySQL, dockerized, SPoF using Apache JMeter, load balancer.

company.name: Amadeus
company.description:
We make the experience of travel better for everyone, everywhere by inspiring innovation, partnerships and responsibility to people, places and planet.

Our technology powers the travel and tourism industry. 

We inspire more connected ways of thinking, centered around the traveler. 

Our platform connects the travel and hospitality ecosystem. We are making travel a force for social and environmental good. 

We are passionate about travel. With a unique perspective, at the heart of our industry, we are redesigning the travel of tomorrow.
